_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:35:01 using v2.1
title: How has the proportion of patients warned of danger signals on discharge changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of patients not being informed of any danger signals they should watch for upon returning home has dropped to 36% in 2013 after remained constant at 38% over the preceding three years.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients
